Class UserController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/user")
 @Controller
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by chun on 3/5/15.
    UserController: Offer the interfaces for the client to authenticate the user by REST.

      • login

        @Scope(value="prototype")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String login(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="password")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="loginTime")
                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String loginTime)
        Offer the interface for the client to login a user
        Parameters:
        username - username for the user
        password - password for the user
        uuid - unique id for the user together with the device id
        loginTime - timestamp when the user login
        Returns:
        result with string type as a json or a xml format
